section.title: JBoss JCA/SJC
section.warning: This standalone configuration is for development purposes only.
section.para: The JBoss JCA/SJC uses the Fungal kernel for its run-time environment.

The homepage for the Fungal is http://jesperpedersen.github.com/fungal.
SJC is short for "Simple JCA Container".
